page.title: 11Where Do Local People Work?
page.content: We surveyed the houses of the children of Knebworth School and received 157 replies. Three replies came from elsewhere so have been discounted. We asked the question "Where does the main wage earner in your family work?" Here are the results of our survey: Knebworth {17 Stevenage {17 London {38 Hatfield { 8 Welwyn {22 Hertford { 2 Elsewhere {45 The single most popular place for work is London. Not many people work in Knebworth itself. Knebworth is what you call a dormitory village. Its good road and rail links make it ideal for people who want to live in a pleasant village and yet be close to centres of work.
